name: Advanced Maze
description:
Do you love mazes? Really? So you're at the right place!!!
An infinity of mazes is waiting for you in 'Advanced Maze'.

With traps (obviously), enemies to avoid (it's better to avoid them), teleporters (= more fun), and so much other things that you can discover...

New game mode: the Blind Mode!!!
Try to finish these new levels without seeing the whole maze...

In the full version, you'll have access to very hard and very fun levels, and more: you'll access a level editor to play with your own levels. Isn't that too much fun? And there is no ad in the full version...

Enjoy!
